AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Child Soldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by a group of people who brainwashed him into obeying whoever has his contract.[PAWN_nameDef] was not a slave, he deserved his "employment".

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Endentured Bodyguard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a quiet and intimidating ghoul, [PAWN_nameDef] is a personal bodyguard and soldier. He always leaves packed with weaponry, and returns with a bag of caps. [PAWN_nameDef] says that he is only good for combat services and that he is "nobody's errand boy."

HediffDef.label: Restless
HediffDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] never sleeps - a strange trait even for a ghoul.
